data.event: As of the 2010 census, the city population was 682; as of 2014, it was estimated to have decreased to 665.

event.title: established a grocery and stage depot on his farm in 1858

data.event: The "Hollenberg Station" became an important hub along the way for Pony Express travelers and he eventually established a grocery and stage depot on his farm in 1858.

event.title: the establishment of the town, in 1868

data.event: Prior to the establishment of the town, in 1868 a school district was established in the area to satisfy the need to educate children of settlers who continued to arrive near the "Hollenberg Station."
